授業目的: 1. To develop students’ TOEIC listening skills2. To develop students’ TOEIC reading skills 3. To help students build their vocabulary knowledge 4. To help students improve their overall test-taking strategies5. To help students become aware of common distractors 6. To help students better understand English as it is used in everyday work and life situations
到達目標: 1. Students will develop their listening and reading skills.2. Students will strengthen their vocabulary knowledge. 3. Students will become better test-takers, carefully attentive to common distractors. 4. Students will familiarize themselves with natural English.
授業方法: 1. This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor.  (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)2.  Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.

第1回: Unit 1 - Listening Test Part 1 - Photographs - Listening for detail
第2回: Unit 2 - Listening Test Part 2 - Question-Response - Time & location Structures
第3回: Unit 3 - Listening Test Part 3 - Conversations - Vocabulary clues to infer meaning
第4回: Unit 4 - Listening Test Part 4 - Re-statements, Numbers & Quantities
第5回: Unit 5 - Reading Test Part 5 - Suffixes & Prefixes
第6回: Unit 6 - Reading Test Part 6 - Clues for choosing past & future verbs forms
第7回: Unit 7 - Reading Test Part 7 - "NOT" questions; Names, numbers, dates & times
第8回: Unit 8 - Listening Test Part 1 - Prepositions & similar sounding words
第9回: Unit 9 - Listening Test Part 2 - Language used in offers, requests & opinions
第10回: Unit 10 - Listening Test Part 3 - Understanding the first exchange & Ways of declining (Saying "No")
第11回: Unit 11 - Listening Test Part 4 - Re-statements of "how" & "why"
第12回: Unit 12 - Reading Test Part 5 - Understanding pronouns
第13回: Unit 13 - Reading Test Part 6 - Choosing the correct prepositions & conjunctions
第14回: Unit 14 - Reading Test Part 7 - Dealing with charts & tables, forms & multiple passages

The instructor will carefully mark students’ attendance as present and on time, late, or absent.
